ch0002_41_kotone/0101_0701_01_10:
Lyra from Team Rocket is here! How do I look,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Surprised?
ch0002_41_kotone/0101_0701_02_10: If the outfit startled you, then my plan worked!
ch0002_41_kotone/7101_0701_01_10:
Curious about my outfit? It’s Team Rocket’s
uniform!
ch0002_41_kotone/7101_0701_02_10:
Oh, it suits me? And I really look like a grunt?
I’m...not sure how I should feel about that.
ch0002_41_kotone/7102_0701_01_10:
A black suit that hides me in the dark! And a
beaming R on my chest!
ch0002_41_kotone/7102_0701_02_10:
I can’t tell if the design is for hiding or
showing off!
ch0002_41_kotone/7103_0701_01_10:
In order to seem like Team Rocket, I just tried
doing something bad!
ch0002_41_kotone/7103_0701_02_10: I secretly snuck some sweets into Ethan’s bag!
ch0002_41_kotone/7103_0701_03_10: I bet he’ll be super confused where they’re from!
ch0002_41_kotone/7104_0701_01_10:
This is my Phanpy⁠—cute but strong at the
same time!
ch0002_41_kotone/7104_0701_02_10:
If you let your guard down, she’ll blow you away
in an instant!
ch0002_41_kotone/7105_0701_01_10:
Pokémon with ill-behaved partners seem
kinda stressed.
ch0002_41_kotone/7105_0701_02_10:
There’s no such thing as a Pokémon that starts off
bad—their Trainer influences them...
ch0002_41_kotone/7105_0701_03_10:
But your Pokémon has such beautiful eyes,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0002_41_kotone/7105_0701_04_10: And that’s proof they see how honest you are!
ch0002_41_kotone/1701_0701_01_10:
Hehehe! I have an important mission for you!
Here, take this!
ch0002_41_kotone/1701_0702_01_10:
You must use this gift from me!
That’s your mission!
ch0002_41_kotone/2501_0701_01_10:
People say you won’t get lonely as long as you’re
around Pokémon, but...
ch0002_41_kotone/2501_0701_02_10: Team Rocket thinks their Pokémon are tools.
ch0002_41_kotone/2501_0701_03_10: It must be so lonely to think like that...
ch0002_41_kotone/2501_0702_01_10:
But I bet there are also people in Team Rocket
who care about their Pokémon!
ch0002_41_kotone/2501_0702_02_10:
Pokémon are so cute and dependable—there’s
no way you can’t like them!
ch0002_41_kotone/2511_0701_01_10:
A while back, Team Rocket took over Johto’s
radio tower!
ch0002_41_kotone/2511_0701_02_10: And they kept playing strange announcements...
ch0002_41_kotone/2511_0701_03_10:
They also took over the Pokémon music station I
was always listening to! It was so frustrating!
ch0002_41_kotone/2511_0702_01_10:
I’d love to introduce you to my favorite radio
program, but the radio waves can’t reach all the
way here to Pasio.
ch0002_41_kotone/2511_0702_02_10:
I wish I could tune in to Johto radio on
my Poryphone.
ch0002_41_kotone/3001_0701_01_10:
I woke up super early. I just couldn’t wait to see
where I’d go today!
ch0002_41_kotone/3003_0701_01_10:
I feel like taking a nap, but it just seems like such
a waste to...sleep.
ch0002_41_kotone/3005_0701_01_10:
Look at all the pretty stars! I bet trying to count
them all would put you to sleep in no
time... *yawn*
